info.title: LMS API Documentation
info.description: Apis to perform various actions on LMS resources

post.description: This API creates a new admin with the provided details.

get.summary: Get a list of course categories

post.description: This API creates a new instructor with the provided details.

items.example: The email has already been taken.

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific instructor by ID.

put.description: Update an instructor's details. Only the provided fields will be updated.

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have Admin Role

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.
No Student found with given ID

email: The email must be a valid email address.

get.description: Fetches a list of all available courses

post.description: Creates a new course with the provided details

description.example: Learn full stack web development from scratch

put.description: Updates a course with the provided details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

get.description: Fetches a list of all available jobs

post.description: Creates a new job posting with the provided details

description.example: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer...

post.summary: Creates a access token to securely get application resources

category_id.description: Must exist in the categories table

per_page.description: Records per page want to get from sever response

bearerAuth.description: Login with email and password to get the authentication token
bearerAuth.name: apiKey
